publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4659 Dave Petrie: Park Primary School Shinty Team, Obanâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Park Primary School, Oban, on its record number of nine shinty tournament wins this season, including the three major competitions and gives particular credit to coach, Duncan Hill, and captain, Gary MacKerracher. Supported by: Robin Harper*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Bill Aitken*, Murdo Fraser*
S2M-4659 Park Primary School Shinty Team, Oban (lodged on 12 July 2006) Mr David Davidson*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-4659 Park Primary School Shinty Team, Oban (lodged on 12 July 2006) Eleanor Scott*
